Room.Name: Hofton Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Hofton Avenue, between the City Walls and the Evenborough Stables.
Room.LongDescription: The City Walls on the north side of the road protect the city from any attacks or invasions of virtually any kind. On the south side of the street, you can see the Evenborough Stables, where visitors are requested to leave their horses. To the west, you can see the intersection with Evenborough Way, and the North Entrance to the City.
